.. _bug-tracker:

Bug tracker
===========

If you have any suggestions, bug reports or annoyances please report them
to our issue tracker at https://github.com/robinhood/deux/issues/

.. _contributing-short:

Contributing
============

Development of `Deux` happens at GitHub: https://github.com/robinhood/deux

You are highly encouraged to participate in the development
of `deux`. If you don't like GitHub (for some reason) you're welcome
to send regular patches.

Be sure to also read the `Contributing to Deux`_ section in the
documentation.

.. _`Contributing to Deux`:
    http://deux.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contributing.html

.. _license:

License
=======

This software is licensed under the `New BSD License`. See the :file:`LICENSE`
file in the top distribution directory for the full license text.
